title: Ireava School ERP System Review
summary: Ireava school ERP system has been a great help for our school! It's made managing student records and administrative tasks much easier. We can easily keep track of attendance, grades, and other important information in one place.
strength: Centralizes important information like attendance and grades, making it convenient to access and track.

title: Ireava School ERP Mobile Application
summary: I can conveniently access student grades, attendance records, and upcoming events through the ERP system, keeping me informed and engaged in education system. With Ireava ERP,  I can connect with teachers, parents, and students for understanding their concerns if any.
weakness: While the ERP system offers incredible benefits, it may take some time to become fully familiar with its features and navigation.

title: Good support
summary: Working with good support has been a great experience for me. The customer service is top-notch and the response time is very fast. Whenever I have any queries or issues, they are always willing to help me out and provide a solution quickly. I'm extremely satisfied with the level of service they provide and highly recommend them.
strength: They are always prompt in responding to our questions and queries, and take the time to explain things in detail. Their expertise on how quotes/estimates impact the product has been invaluable for our company - it's helped us make more informed decisions that have had a positive impact on our bottom line. I highly recommend good support for any business looking for reliable and knowledgeable customer support!
weakness: nothing... I have never encountered any problems when using it. The customer service team is always so helpful and attentive, they are always there to answer my questions or solve any issues I might have. Plus, the response time is fast and the user experience is smooth. Good support is a fantastic piece of software!

title: No Longer "Allway Sync" - it's only "Goodsync" now
summary:
Allway Sync is now a for pay only product called "Good Sync"  
Not much to say since I'm not in the market for a product that is limited in this way.  Might still be a good product but not for me.
strength: Allway Sync was reliable and had a nice UI.  All sync programs are about the same.  For me, the ability to do 1. an "exclude" function down to the individual file level as well as a 2. "log on errors only" function are important features.  (Allway Sync" didn't do the log only errors as I recall but not certain)
weakness:
It no longer seems to exist - has become "Good Sync" and is pay only.  No longer open source free.  
BTW - I for one, pretty much always chip in donations to open source developers.  Quite often donate more than once when I'm feeling good about the software. But being forced into paying in advance makes me change how I evaluate the deal and usually don't go along with the business model.  When possible - that's my choice.

title: Socioboard is the best social media platform with easily accessible feature
summary: Overall I can say that Socioborad has done commendable work for my brand. I had no clue about social media marketing. It improves great traffic on my new website.
strength: Its yearly plan is so beneficial, which I recently bought. I would like to recommend it to every new marketer.
weakness: Developers need to add some more platforms to the site. And after all, this is amazing.

title: Contract management for the entire organisation that is easy for everyone to use.
summary: Very positive experience. I use it on a daily basis, but it does not feel like I am spending time on contract management. The platform guides you and lets you know what needs to be done proactively before events.
strength: Timely reminders to me as the main party, but also to the other parties and the auditor.
weakness: There are few advanced features that I do not use.
